mapper.select: SELECT `goods`.goods_id,`goods`.resale_price,`goods`.selled, `art`.art_author,`art`.art_introduction,`art`.art_name, `file`.file_path,`file`.file_format, `user`.user_name FROM `goods`,`art`,`file`,`user` WHERE `goods`.art_id = `art`.art_id and `file`.file_id = `art`.art_file and `goods`.goods_seller_id = `user`.user_id AND `goods`.selled = false LIMIT #{start},#{limit}

SELECT `goods`.goods_id,`goods`.resale_price,`goods`.selled, `art`.art_id,`art`.art_author,`art`.art_introduction,`art`.art_name, `file`.file_id,`file`.file_path,`file`.file_format, `user`.user_id,`user`.user_name FROM `goods`,`art`,`file`,`user` WHERE `goods`.art_id = `art`.art_id and `file`.file_id = `art`.art_file and `goods`.goods_seller_id = `user`.user_id and `goods`.goods_id = #{goodId}

SELECT `goods`.goods_id,`goods`.resale_price,`goods`.selled, `art`.art_id,`art`.art_author,`art`.art_introduction,`art`.art_name, `file`.file_id,`file`.file_path,`file`.file_format, `user`.user_id,`user`.user_name FROM `goods`,`art`,`file`,`user` WHERE `goods`.art_id = `art`.art_id and `file`.file_id = `art`.art_file and `goods`.goods_seller_id = `user`.user_id AND `goods`.selled = false AND (`art`.art_name like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR `art`.art_introduction like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR `art`.art_author like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%'))
